trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised when the first HTTP module in the web application references the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> 이벤트가 참조 하는 웹 응용 프로그램에 있는 첫 번째 HTTP 모듈에서 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성.

trans-unit.source: The first access of the this property causes a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object to be created and initialized from configuration.
trans-unit.target: 이 첫 번째 액세스가 속성 원인을 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> 개체를 만들고 구성에서 초기화할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can access the newly created <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property in an event handler in order to examine or modify it.
trans-unit.target: 새로 만든에 액세스할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> 개체를 통해는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 검사 하거나 수정 하기 위해 이벤트 처리기의 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration" /> object contains the configurable properties for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" />) and the Session Authentication Module (<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule" />) in a web application.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration" /> 개체는 WS-Federation 인증 모듈(<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule" />)에 대한 구성 가능 속성 및 웹 응용 프로그램의 세션 인증 모듈(<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule" />)을 포함합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs" /> class with the specified federation configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 페더레이션 구성 개체를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the federation configuration object specified by `config`.
trans-unit.target: 초기화는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A> 속성을 지정 하는 페더레이션 구성 개체가 `config`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the federation configuration object that was initialized from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 구성 파일에서 초기화된 연합 구성 개체를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The federation configuration object that was initialized from configuration.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object contains the configurable properties for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) in a web application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> WS-페더레이션 인증 모듈에 대 한 구성 가능한 속성을 포함 하는 개체 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) 및 세션 인증 모듈 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) 웹 응용 프로그램에서입니다.

trans-unit.source: To modify the configuration settings, you can set properties on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object that is referenced by this property, or you can provide an new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object.
trans-unit.target: 구성 설정을 수정 하려면 속성을 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> 하거나이 속성에서 참조 되는 개체가 새는 제공할 수 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> 개체입니다.
